level.heading: Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 6(a) of Metropolitan Police Housing Assistance Program and Community Safety Temporary Act of 1993 (D.C. Law 10-63, October 8, 1993, law notification 40 DCR _).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-118, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3801.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-70, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3806.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-60, see Historical and Statutory Notes following 42-2601.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: D.C. Law 12-59, title XI, § 1101 (44 DCR 7356), eff. March 20, 1998, provides for the temporary repeal of §§ 45-2221 to 45-2226 [1981 Ed.]. Section 2001(b) of D.C. Law 12-59 provides for expiration "after 225 days of its having taken effect."
